WorkItem.ClosedComment: Fixed in BibWord v.1.9. Styles suffering from this bug will be updated in the next few days.
WorkItem.Description:
Yves this is just to let you know that there is a bug in the abbreviate-name function. The code that deals with inserting dashes (when keepDashes = 1) and spaces (when keepSpaces = 1) does not work. The reason is that you've missed the "$" when you test the two parameters (lines 1803 and 1820 are
<xsl:if test="keepDashes = 1"> and <xsl:if test="keepSpaces = 1"> instead of <xsl:if test="$keepDashes = 1"> and <xsl:if test="$keepSpaces = 1">). I know that the issue occurs in HarvardAnglia.XLS and the main template. I haven't checked the rest.

Comments.Message: Fixed in BibWord v.1.9. The styles will be updated in the next few days.
